title: Make Add buttons visible across all management sections

requirements.summary: Add prominent Add buttons with shadow and mix colors to all remaining management sections that currently lack visible Add buttons, ensuring consistent styling with existing implementations
acceptanceCriteria: Add buttons are visible in all management forms including SyllabusManagementForm, StandaloneVideoManagementForm, and StandaloneNoteManagementForm
All Add buttons use consistent shadow styling and mix colors for high visibility
Add buttons are positioned consistently across all sections (GK topics, IQ categories, Second Paper topics, Third Paper topics, Syllabus, Old Questions, Exam, Notes)
Button styling matches the visual design pattern established in existing management forms
